content:
Hi,

currently a moderator can create new streams, but cant change name or description after creation. Is there a way?
At the moment a Moderator must invite a Admin to the stream and only than a admin can change such settings.

Would be cool to have it easyier :)

Thx!

Erik

@Erik we're working on an overhaul of all of our permissions settings to be a lot more flexible, and changing that is definitely one of the major goals. #design > New permissions model is the main thread for it, but it's a big enough project there's like a dozen different efforts working towards it in parallel.

It won't be ready in 8.0 this Fall, but I very much hope it will be in 9.0 next Spring.
